Hi Georgia,

Confirming we have updated this page.
https://proposal.advantagestyling.com.au/next-steps/

Hello Heath,


Hope you are well.


On the quote platform there is a page appear that doesn't seem to be rebranded. When a customer selects Pay on Success or Pay Later on the proposal and then accepts the proposal and then click "Back to Advantage" they are directed to the below page (see email chain) that hasn't been updated. Could you please take a look at this and update when you get a chance?


Proposal > Pay on Success or Pay Later > Accept Proposal > Back to Advantage (issue page)


Hopefully, that makes sense but please let me know if you have any questions.


Kind Regards,


Georgia Sloane
